question: Display research papers and review articles formatted in APA citation style.
sql_query1:
SELECT Research_Papers.title
FROM Research_Papers
WHERE Research_Papers.citation_style = "APA"
UNION
SELECT Review_Articles.title
FROM Review_Articles
WHERE Review_Articles.citation_style = "APA"
sql_query2:
SELECT Research_Papers.title
FROM Research_Papers
UNION
SELECT Review_Articles.title
FROM Review_Articles
WHERE Review_Articles.citation_style = "APA"
interpretation1: What research papers and review articles follow the APA citation style?
interpretation2: List all research papers and also show review articles formatted according to APA citation style.
